44.ara-name: كتاب الأمثال عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated (Another route) from Az-Zuhri:with this chain, and it is similar, but he said: "You can find a mount among them." - from Salim, from Ibn 'Umar that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "People are but like one hundred camels, you can not find a mount among them - or he said - you can not find but one mount among them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي مَثَلِ ابْنِ آدَمَ وَأَجَلِهِ وَأَمَلِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Parable Of The Son Of Adam, His Lifespan And His Hope
